reviewText:
Bible Code 101 --absolutely beautiful, sound picture. and this dvd is a classic on Bible Code.
No close caption.

It is the best discussion on the issue that you can access without having to learn ancient hebrew language and without theological guidance form an expert at Kabalah and Talmud. It is really well balanced documentary, interestingly exploring positive and negative arguments to the existence of the code. Recomended tomeveryone believing in the holly texts.
